content: the granny square hot pad is a free crochet pattern on my blog this easy double-thick pot holder is made from a basic crochet granny square worked to approximately a 12 square in 3 different colors the square is then folded and seamed to create a double layer hot pad this crochet granny square pot holder is a great way to use up your cotton yarn scraps customize easily by changing colors adding rounds to make larger add the wood ring or crochet a hanging loop you choose i have a complete tutorial to help you with a basic granny square if you are new to crochet as well as a tutorial to walk you through folding and seaming your pot holder as well
